RORSCHACH (cont'd) Dogs get put down. Rorschach SWINGS the cleaver DOWN. Blood SPATTERS his mas
The Psychiatrist listens, paralyzed. Horrified.

A tremor of impact shook my arm. Warm blood splashed my face. It was Walter Kovacs who screamed, who closed his eyes-- it was Rorschach who opened them again. The silence reels out RORSCHACH (cont'd) You see, Doctor. God didn't kill that little girl, fate didn't butcher her and destiny didn't feed her to those dogs. If God saw what any of us did that night, he didn't seem to mind. From then on, I knew. God doesn't make the world this way. We do. The Psychiatrist rises shakily. He crosses to the GUARD.
I can't help him.
The Mess hall is PACKED, hundreds of INMATES eat dinner. Rorschach enters. The place goes instantly, heavily SILEN Suddenly someone yells:

Hey Rorschach, I heard your momma was a whore! A cruel RIPPLE OF LAUGHTER and the mass conversation begi again as Rorschach takes his place in the food line. A HU PRISONER moves in behind him. He whispers:
Hey, Rorschach. You're pretty famous, right? Y'know, I'm pretty famous too. Maybe I can give you my autograph. The Prisoner slides a SHIV from his sleeve (CONTINUED)

Rorschach doesn't register this. He waits for the FRY-COO behind the counter to turn away-- --then casually reaches across and lifts the DEEP-FRYER BASKET from its mount-- --the Prisoner JABS the shiv forward--Rorschach spins, GRIPPING the man's wrist and FLINGING the BOILING GREASE THE MAN'S FACE. The man SHRIEKS like a FIRE WHISTLE and CRASHES TO THE GROUND. The Guards DESCEND on Rorschach. Rorschach is calm as he's dragged away. As the injured ma screams fall away to weak, bubbling hitches, the room onc again goes silent. Rorschach eyes the fearful, hateful ey of the room, marking each one. And in the silence he spea his icy voice carrying easily.
None of you understand. I'm not locked up in here with you. Rorschach is placidly dragged off INTO DARKNESS
You're locked up in here with me.

CLOSE ON: THE NITE-OWL UNIFORM, staring its blank, empty stare. Laurie stares back, alone down here, fascinated wi the costume, the gadgets, the whole place. She wanders to OWL-SHIP, whose tarp has been pulled back. She runs her finger through the DUST caked on the windshield.
Inside the ship, Laurie pulls open a HATCH filled with ALTERNATE COSTUMES; designed for underwater work, cold conditions, heavy armor. She puts a cigarette in her mout
All these gadgets and there isn't even a dash lighter She hits a BUTTON--the lights inside go DIM. Creepy. She the button again to turn the lights back on but nothing
Dan returns home with some TAKE OUT FOOD . . when he hear Laurie SCREAM downstairs. (CONTINUED)
Laurie?! Dan BOLTS for the basement door, thoughts of the mask-kil on his mind.
Dan descends the stairs and sees FIRE.
Dan grabs a FIRE EXTINGUISHER.
Where are you?! Dan SPRAYS the fire. Laurie stumbles from the smoke, out the Owl-Ship. Dan's got the fire under control now.
I'm so sorry--I hit the wrong button. I was looking for the lighter in.there.
I don't smoke. Are you hurt?
I'm fine, but your ship--
Ah, that's mostly just soot. Archie's pretty resilient.
Archie?
(EMBARRASSED)
Short for Archimedes--Merlin's owl. I'm just glad you're okay. I heard you scream and well, you know, after the Comedian--
Still with the mask-killer theory? Rorschach is insane.
Maybe, but the Comedian murdered; Jon exiled; Someone tries to shoot Adrian; Rorschach gets arrested. It makes me uneasy. (CONTINUED)
Dan goes to a BANK OF SWITCHES on the wall. Flicking them the Owl-Chamber LIGHTS UP. Hidden FANS dissipate the smok
How did you ever afford all this?
My Dad was in corporate banking. He left me quite a bit. Which always surprised me.
How did he die?
Mugging. He was shot. As Dan cleans up, Laurie watches him, like she's seeing h for the first time.
You really do worry about me, don't you?
Huh? Well, yeah, of course I worry about you, I mean, we're, y'know, friends-- Laurie takes off his glasses . and KISSES him. It's what Dan's been wanting all this time . but he pulls away.
Sorry, I
What's wrong? But Dan is already walking up the stairs, pathetic. Lauri left there, alone. The Owl-Costume looming in the backgro
Rorschach sits in his cell, staring impassively at the wa

It's been a long time, Rorschach. Rorschach turns to see TWO THUGS standing side by side, o muscle bound, the other very fat, staring at him through bars. PAN DOWN: To reveal a MIDGET between them--the supervillain known as the BIG FIGURE--his silver hair com neatly back, a big CIGAR perched in his tiny mouth. (CONTINUED)
Big Figure. Small world.
(chuckles through smoke) I like that. But you know, it is a small world in here. I've been in it for--how long now, Billy?
Twenty years, Mr. Figure.

That's right. Twenty years since you and that owl fella put me away. Rorschach-- that guy you burned is dying. Could go any minute now. And when he does, this place is gonna explode. Then you die by inches.
Tall order.
(SLAMS into the bars) I'm gonna tear this guy a new hole!
Relax, Lloyd. Soon. Chuckling, Big Figure walks off down the long, shadowed corridor. Rorschach continues staring, straight ahead.

CLOSE ON: Dan, naked, on his knees in the center of an INFINITE FIELD OF BLACKNESS. No corners, no exits. In the DISTANCE, he sees a FEMALE FORM. Desperate, he runs to he It's Laurie, waiting for him IN COSTUME. They kiss. She t at him passionately. His SKIN suddenly TEARS AWAY like wrapping paper. Beneath the false skin, Dan wears his NIT OWL COSTUME. Confident, he touches her face. She smiles w palpable heat. They kiss. In the background, a NUCLEAR BLAST ERUPTS. Still kissing, BLAST BLOWS THEM INTO TWO EMBRACING SKELETONS.
Dan wakes with a jolt, sweat beaded on his forehead 75.
The DOOR opens. Laurie stands in the SHAFT OF LIGHT.
Dan? Is everything okay? I heard you coming down the stairs Descending the stairs, she finds Dan before his costume, naked. He fiddles with an OWL-WING THROWING WEAPON.
Mask killers. War. Nuclear annihilation. I feel so powerless, so I've been afraid of this damn costume. Afraid of how much I need it. He FLINGS the owl wing crescent, whizzing into the dark.
So. Let's take the ship out.
What?

Who's to know? I used to be a "masked avenger" too, remember? I'm used to getting up at three in the morning to do something stupid. Besides, I'm already a wanted lady, you're already in trouble for hiding me, how much more trouble can we be in? Just give me a second--can't go out like this. She jogs upstairs. Dan turns to the empty, waiting suit.
PAN UP: DAN'S COSTUMED BODY. The Nite Owl suit is fantast intricate, but above the belly . it just barely fits, Dan managing to CLICK it closed.

I can't believe it still fits. Luckily I constructed it with material that was elastic and-- Dan turns as Laurie appears at the door, decked in her BL SPANDEX. SILK SPECTRE, looking every bit as good as seven
--form fitting (CONTINUED)
I'm ready. Dan turns and sees his reflection in the owl-Ship's windo
Me too.

Laurie holds on as the Owl-Ship's ENGINES ROAR to life. T ship RISES INTO THE AIR and slips easily into the TUNNEL. Laurie watches the LIGHTS of the tunnel whiz by. At the e two big STEEL DOORS open, allowing a passage UP.
Let's have some cloud cover.
THICK FOG POURS FROM LOWER-DECK JETS as the ship RISES in an ABANDONED WAREHOUSE, whose steel roof ROLLS BACK.
Laurie touches the window, the SPARKLING CITY laid out be
It's so beautiful
Hang on. Dan BANKS, wheeling the ship toward the VELDT BUILDING.

Got to clean her up a bit. I'm sure Adrian wouldn't want to impede the course of justice. Heading straight for the building, Dan JIGS at the last moment, flying the ship THROUGH THE V-SHAPED WATERFALL in skyscraper's center. The water washes clean the years of dust. The Owl-Ship emerges, sparkling like new.
Look! Below, a TENEMENT BUILDING is ENGULFED IN FLAME. Dan's ja sets. He wheels the ship around and down. As they zoom closer, they can see people SCREAMING from the windows. (CONTINUED)
There's children in there!
I'm putting the water cannons on the lower stories. (over the LOUDSPEAKERS)

head_text.subj: PLEASE REMAIN CALM. WE ARE SLOWING THE
FIRE DOWN FROM BELOW. CALMLY MAKE YOUR
WAY TO THE ROOF AND I'LL EXTEND A RAMP TO

text: (to Laurie) Can you escort the people over? She watches him move, quick, confident. She smiles.
I'm on it. Nite Owl.
The ship EXTENDS AN ESCAPE RAMP with Laurie on board. The residents forget their fear of fire for a moment as they in the spectacle of this sexy lady on this Owl-Ship.

Hi. If you could all form a line, we'll have you out of here in just a moment. ATOP THE SHIP: Dan latches the steering column into its r socket. He stands; Takes a deep, chest-expanding breath. has he been kidding? This is who he is. Flicking a switch JAZZ plays pleasantly.
Below, the residents file on board, in a daze at their surroundings. Laurie grins at the music.
Anybody want coffee?
FIRE rising behind, Dan wings the ship STRAIGHT INTO FRAM
The Owl-Ship RISES, leaving a grateful CROWD behind. In t background FIRE TRUCKS are just arriving. A FIREFIGHTER l up in time to see the Owl-Ship disappear into the clouds. 78.
Dan skims the clouds like a man waking from a dream.
I can't believe we did that! That was actually fun

Yeah. He puts a hand on her shoulder. His eyes locked onto hers knows what he wants and this time he's not afraid of it He kisses her. Hard. Running her hands up his cheeks, the slide each other's masks off. Their mouths melt together.
Soft music plays. Dan and Laurie lie in a heap of discard costumes.
It was good, wasn't it?
Yeah, saving those people from the fire. Taking Archie out Laurie swats him on the chest--that's not what she meant. grins, having fun with her.
It--you were unbelievable. They kiss.
So . what do we do next? Dan sits up, serious. Very serious.
I've been thinking about that. And I believe we have certain obligations to our fraternity. (BEAT)
I think we should spring Rorschach.
Long beat. The ship hovers, silent in the clouds. (CONTINUED)
What?
The Prisoner Rorschach burned lies in bed, his face completely bandaged, hooked to an IV . . when he FLATLINE
Down the dark corridors, a ROAR is building. ALARMS ring. Figure and his two Thugs appear at the door.

He's dead, Rorschach--the riot's already begun. While everyone's distracted, we thought we'd bring you a housewarming gift. Something from the machine shop. The Fat Thug wheels an ELECTRICAL WELDER to the door. Rorschach sits, idly TEARING his PRISON SHIRT into STRIPS
Hey Boss, y'notice? None of that "small world, tall order" crap, cuz he knows once we slice open this lock, he's next on the block.
Fat chance. The Fat Thug reddens. He DIVES forward, HANDS SWIPING for Rorschach.
You're dead, Rorschach! We got a prison full of killers out here! What've you got? Rorschach SPINS, WRAPPING A SHIRT-STRIP AROUND HIS WRISTS trapping the Fat Thug's hands inside the cell.
Your hands. My pleasure. Rorschach SNAPS Fat Thug's pinky fingers. Fat Thug SHRIEK Rorschach roughly binds the fingers around the bars. Dumb Thug tries to reach the welder around Fat Thug's bod
I can't reach the lock. Should I cut the bars? (CONTINUED)
This riot won't last. And I've been waiting twenty years for this Big Figure nods to the Dumb Thug, who then grabs Fat Thug neck.
Nothing personal, big guy.
Boss, you can't be serious! Wait-- Dumb Thug SNAPS Fat Thug's neck. He then CUTS OFF Fat Thu hands with the welder, pushes the corpse out of the way t reach the lock. Big Figure grins at Rorschach.
Now you find out what the score is.
One-nothing. Come and get me.
Dan and Laurie are back in costume.
Look, Dan, I'm glad you were able to rediscover your calling in life, but I think you're getting carried away. You're talking about springing a homicidal psychopath from prison.

Rorschach may be sick, but I think he's on to something--four heroes attacked in a week is not a coincidence. I mean, that whole cancer thing with ion, does that make sense to you? You didn't contract cancer from him. He says as Laurie's about to light a cigarette. She chang her mind.
Why would someone want to drive ion away? Look what's happening now. With Jon gone it looks like we're headed for another World War. Who would want that? (CONTINUED)
OUTSIDE THE WINDOW: The Owl-Ship approaches a ROOFTOP wit HELIPAD. On the helipad is a HELICOPTER with the Veidt Enterprises LOGO.
I don't know. But I know someone who might be able to help. Dan lands the Owl-Ship on the roof.
Surprisingly, Adrian is awake, packing his things, hustli about his grand mansion as Dan and Laurie trail.
You're leaving town? So you do believe Rorschach's theory.
Please. Right now, I'm not concerned with this so-called mask-killer, I'm concerned with the mass killer called war, or have you not heard. (calling out) On ! A WALL SIZED MIRROR turns into a TV:
--US Aircraft Carriers have already moved into the Persian Gulf and US Battleships have left Japan en route to the Far East
It's happening Dan breaks away from the terrible news, follows Adrian.
All the more reason we need to get to the bottom of this. Maybe we can get Jon to come back in the process and stop all this madness.
Nothing we do will bring Jon back! (glances at Laurie) But I think you know that already. And breaking Rorschach out of prison certainly isn't the answer. (CONTINUED)
Rorschach's been the only one investigating this from the start. Without him, we're starting at the beginning and we don't have that kind of time. We need your help, Adrian.
I'm leaving, Dan. And I suggest you both do the same. Adrian pulls on a thick WINTER COAT and heads upstairs.
Adrian walks briskly to his idling COPTER, propellers lou cutting through the air. Dan gives one last effort, shout
Where are you going to go?
Antarctica. It takes Dan a moment to realize Adrian is serious. By th Adrian's halfway into the helicopter.
Good luck, Dan. He says it sincerely. Dan watches the helicopter fly off.
Dumb Thug WELDS, the lock GLOWS RED. Nearly through. Rorschach backs away from the door as Big Figure trembles excitement.

Hurry Lloyd! I wanna smell this sonofabitch cooking! The lock MELTS AWAY. Rorschach climbs onto his bunk as Du Thug enters, JABBING the electric welder at him menacingl Rorschach drives his HEEL into the porcelain TOILET BOWL, SHATTERING IT. WATER SPILLS across the floor. Rorschach K Dumb Thug in the stomach; Dumb Thug buckles, then SLIPS i the water--Dumb Thug falls, welder still in hand as he hi the water Dumb Thug's hand FUSES to the welder as ELECTRICITY SURGE THROUGH HIM. He collapses, smoking. Dead. (CONTINUED)
Hmm. Never disposed of sewage with a toilet before. Obvious, really. Big Figure looks very small and alone now
Two-nothing. Your move. Panic stricken, Big Figure moves, or rather, runs. Rorsch calmly follows him out of the cell.
The Owl-Ship tears through the sky, the prison ahead on t horizon. Dan has his game face on; Laurie's still unsure.
You don't have to do this. I know the whole crimefighting thing wasn't necessarily your choice in life.
No. But this is. She moves next to him.
But I'm not doing it for Rorschach or even for Jon. And I'm sure as hell not doing if for the Comedian. They look at each other--Dan knows who she's doing it for The Owl-Ship is upon the prison now

Look! They see a RIOT below--Inmates spilling out into the yard overwhelming the Correctional Officers on the ground; TOW GUARDS take shots at some of the Inmates; Broken glass, broken furniture parts scattered through the yard; SMOKE emits from inside the prison.

Hmm, Rorschach gets locked up in here and suddenly there's a riot. I wonder if that's a coincidence. They descend toward the hell of TEAR-GAS, FIRE and VIOLEN The Tower Guards, stunned at the sight of the Owl-Ship, b SHOOTING at it. The bullets bounce right off. (CONTINUED)
Put your ear-plugs in.
The ship emits a PIERCING SHRIEK. WINDOWS SHATTER. The Inmates and Guards fall to the ground in sonic agony.
How are we going to find Rorschach in all of this?

When he and I were partners, we each had tracking implants put under our skin so old Archie here could find us if either one of us were ever in trouble. Let's see if Rorschach kept his in. Dan turns on the GPS monitor. There's a BLIP on the scree
He's in that wing. Dan steers the ship toward the Maximum Security Wing. 9
The Owl-Ship stops to a hover position. The LOWER HATCH O and a LADDER extends As Laurie descends the ladder, Dan simply, joyously LEAPS OUT, his wings SNAP WIDE to GLIDE him through the air.

Fires burn in the cells. Shotguns and screams echo in the emergency lighting. Archie's Owl-Shriek is dulled here--i quiet. Tense. Laurie and Dan turn the corner, searching. Laurie spots t BODY of a DEAD GUARD. She crouches to take his PISTOL, sl it into her waistband.
How do we know he's still alive? They come upon Rorschach's cell. Dan sees the SMOKING COR of Dumb Thug. Sees the CUT OFF HANDS of Fat Thug, HANGING from the bars. (CONTINUED)
He's alive.
Big Figure runs, turns a corner, ducking into the BATHROO Rorschach sees this and walks serenely after him . when Dan and Laurie enter the far hall.
Is that--
Rorschach? Rorschach!
Hello, Daniel, Ms. Jupiter. Excuse me, I just have to visit the men's room. He disappears into the dark bathroom. Laurie watches afte him in stunned disbelief.
Oh, for Christ's sake.
Hey, it happens. I remember I lost a big arrest like that once. Had to redesign the costume after that-- Rorschach exits the bathroom, wiping his hands.
We can leave now. He walks off.
Are you sure you're ready? We don't want to go diving head-first into things.
Good Advice. I'm sure there are many who'd agree with you. Behind them: BLOODY WATER FLOODS from the bathroom door a they go.
The trio crosses the roof as Dan calls Archie by REMOTE. (CONTINUED)
Good to see you in uniform, Daniel. What happened? Finally taking the mask-killer seriously?
I'm not.
Of course you haven't been attacked yet. Funny, most everyone else has.
What's that supposed to mean? We came here to rescue you, asshole!
Hey! Survive now! Argue later! I had to turn the screechers off, so we'll be drawing fire. The owl-Ship rises to the roof. They all jump in.
Under HEAVY FIRE the Owl-Ship ZOOMS OFF, leaving the chao behind.
Dan weaves and whips the ship into the sky, above the clo Satisfied that they've escaped, Dan allows himself a grin looks at Laurie, who grins back.
Rorschach, you remember how to handle Archie?
I believe so. Rorschach sits in the pilot's seat. Dan turns to Laurie, on adrenaline and love. Dan moves in to kiss her--
Daniel.
Give us a second--
I don't think this can wait. (CONTINUED)
What? What is it Dan looks up, through the windshield, and sees-- --Dr. Manhattan WALKING ACROSS THE CLOUDS--STRAIGHT FOR T SHIP.
It `s him. The ship COLLIDES with Dr. Manhattan, who PASSES THROUGH the CABIN with a SHOWER of BLUE PARTICLES--
Hello Laurie.
They said you were on Mars.
I am on Mars. You and I are about to have a conversation there.
Where? What are you talking about?
You are going to try to convince me to save the world.
Wait, what? You're taking her to Mars? No, she can't--Laurie, I don't know about
Laurie looks at Dan then at Dr. Manhattan. Comprehending
I have to go, Dan. Jon and I, we're going to talk. Maybe we'll find some way out of this mess the world's gotten itself in. I'll be okay. Really.
Laurie and Dr. Manhattan BURST INTO PARTICLES--they're go Dan stares at the space where Laurie just was.
No time for heartbreak, Daniel. (CONTINUED)
Dan notes TWO BLIPS on the RADAR.
TWO NYPD HELICOPTERS appear behind the Owl-Ship INSIDE THE OWL SHIP: Dan takes the controls.
Let's try and lose them in the city. He hits the jets, heading for the New York SKYLINE.
A red vista. Dr. Manhattan and Laurie appear atop a rise.
So. What do you think?
J--huc? Hhhhhhh-- Laurie GRIPS her throat and TUMBLES down the hill. She ro into Jon, waiting for her at the bottom. She CLAWS at him
Oh. Forgive me. These things sometimes slip my mind. He TOUCHES her mouth, forming a small ATMOSPHERE around h She HEAVES in air, retching and choking at the same time.
Jon, you stupid bastard! Listen, you better not forget this air supply or whatever it is (looking up) Oh shit. Laurie stands up before Jon's huge GLASS PALACE.
I'm on Mars.

The Owl-Ship WEAVES around the buildings, trying to shake copters . but the pilots are good, staying on its tail. The Owl-Ship shoots out of the city over the water . Dan LOOPS Archie around-- (CONTINUED)
--and heads straight for a SUBWAY TUNNEL
. just clearing it. The Owl-Ship SKIMS the sides of the tunnel, SPARKS flying-- --when a SUBWAY appears. They're heading straight for it.
oh no.
Tactical error, Daniel.
I know-- They head straight for the subway-- --when the tunnel opens up-- --Dan SWERVES to the adjacent track just in time.
The Owl-Ship emerges from the subway tunnel . when one of the NYPD copters cuts it off.

Shit. Dan accelerates, weaving Archie around the skyscrapers, t Empire State Building . but the copter's still there. Dan cuts around the UNITED NATIONS BUILDING. The copter follows the Owl-Ship around to the East River . but the Owl-Ship is nowhere to be found The copter hovers there. Baffled.
The Owl-Ship rests at the bottom of the river, hidden
A group of GANG MEMBERS (with the black and yellow bandan who confronted Dan on the subway earlier in the film) wal down the block when another Gang Member catches up, runni (CONTINUED)
Yo, y'all hear? Some super owl dude broke Rorschach outta prison.
Rorschach? That fool put my cousin in a
You say Nite Owl broke him out? Didn't he write a book or something? He lives over a garage near here.
Does he now
Hollis sits up in bed, TV on: CNN; Grainy, shaky CLIPS of Owl-Ship. He's on the phone, beaming.
It's just like old times, Sal. Nite Owl and Silk Spectre back at it again. CUT TO: Sally Jupiter on the other end in California, watching the same footage.
I always knew Laurie had it in her. Sorry for waking you, Hollis.
I may be retired from the costume, but my sleeping habits have never changed. There's a KNOCK at Hollis's door.
Who--there's someone at the door. It might be Dan and Laurie--they may need help. I better go. Hollis hangs up, heads to the door, excited. He opens the

--and the Gang Members PILE INTO HIM. The picture SLOWS D Hollis turns, mouth bleeding. HOLLIS' POV IS SEPIA TONED. gang appears as a COLLECTION of VILLAINS in COSTUMES. SLOW, SEPIA: A young Hollis is in his old COSTUME. The VO come from the present, while Hollis is lost in the past. (CONTINUED)

In his SLO-MO world, Hollis PASTES at Villain in the mout in reality, he gets nailed. This intercutting continues u the Gang Leader picks up the GOLD STATUE of Hollis in cos whose base reads: IN GRATITUDE
Hold on, Derf, are you sure this is the right guy--he, he's just an old man.
Then I'm probably doing him a favor. Hollis, old again, looks up. The SHADOW of the statue DESCENDS HARD TOWARD HIS FACE--GO BLACK.
The Owl-Ship moves slowly through the water.
I hate this. How long are we going to stay down here? Daniel! Dan says nothing. Rorschach puts on his costume.
You're letting fear paralyze you. And that woman--
Hey! We took enough unnecessary risks bringing Archie up so you could get your spare costume. We stay put until it cools down out there--they're looking for us.
Unnecessary? Cowering in the sludge, from the authorities, that's unnecessary. Rorschach pulls his mask on, turns.
While we waste time, the mask-killer gets closer. We need to get to Pyramid Industries. Dan sits at the COMPUTER.
I know, you told me already. I'm tapping into all the databases, finding out about the company-- (CONTINUED)
Sitting at a computer? No. We need to trace the killer--hit up underworld contacts, squeeze people. You've forgotten how we do things. You've been lazing around too long.

Listen, I HAVE HAD IT! Who the hell do you think you are? You live off people while insulting them, and no one complains because they think you're a goddamn lunatic! Dan turns away, shaking. He leans against the console.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have said that. Maybe you're right, maybe--
Dan turns. Rorschach holds out an open hand.
You are a good friend. I'm sorry that it is sometimes difficult with me. Touched, Dan shakes his hand. An awkward, lovely moment.
Hey forget it It's okay, man. Releasing his hand with some effort, Dan sits, invigorate
You're right. It's time to head up.
The Owl-Ship BURSTS THROUGH THE SURFACE OF THE WATER
Let's really start plumbing the depths.
Jon leads Laurie into the Glass Palace. (CONTINUED)
Our conversation commences when you surprise me with the information that you and Dreiberg have been sleeping together.
You . know about me and Dan?
Not yet. But in a few moments, you're going to tell me.
Jon, I'm having enough problems right now without getting into your predestination crap.
Why does my perception of time distress you so?
Because. If you already know the future, why were you surprised when I left you, or when that reporter ambushed you? Why even debate if you already know the outcome?
Because everything is pre-ordained. Even my responses.
Agh! This is so typical of you! Do you know what a relief it is to be with somebody human, like Dan?
You mean you're sleeping with Dan Dreiberg? Contemplating this, he steps to the balcony's edge.
But you already know . You said--
I said, often, that you were my only remaining link with the world. Now that link is shattered. Don't you see the futility of asking me to save a world that I no longer have any stake in? (CONTINUED)
That's ridiculous. The Earth is too important to hinge on one relationship.
Not to me. My red world here means more to me than your blue one. I'll show you around if you like. The giant Glass Palace begins to RUMBLE.
Are you doing this? I'm not in the mood for jokes.
Nor I. Believe me, I fully understand the gravity of the situation. The clockwork Glass Palace RISES HIGH INTO THE AIR

The Owl-Ship approaches the large warehouse building that Pyramid Industries. The ship lands in the alley nearby. Dan and Rorschach exit the ship. Shady neighborhood. Rorschach goes to the door which is AJAR
Dan and Rorschach slowly make their way down, peering int ROOMS. The place looks abandoned--scattered papers, dusty file cabinets, leftover computer components
You sure this is the correct location, Daniel?
Positive. Pyramid Industries. Specializes in industrial plastics. At least they did.
They enter the large, dark industrial section of the building. They pass huge PROCESSING VATS, CONVEYOR BELTS. (CONTINUED)

I tapped into all the databases--tax records, business registries, real estate records--trying to get a bead on who's behind Pyramid but it's a never ending paper trail. Rorschach investigates ahead when Dan catches some MOVEME --he turns his FLASHLIGHT to find a few HOMELESS PEOPLE squatting in the warehouse. Upon seeing Dan in.costume, t Homeless People run away.
Daniel.
They're harmless, Rorschach.

Daniel. Rorschach is looking down at something. Dan heads over an sees a DEAD BODY in the early stages of decomposition. He turns the body over--bullet between the eyes just like Mo . but we recognize the corpse--it's journalist Doug Roth.
Hey, I know this man.
Yes. Doug Roth. Journalist who grilled Dr. Manhattan on national television.
No I didn't watch that interview. This was the guy who was doing a story on Adrian when I went to see him.
Hmm. Journalist set up Dr. Manhattan, was probably working to set up Veidt also. Dan stands there thinking. As if hit with an epiphany. He opens his mouth like he can't believe what he's going to
Rorschach. What, what if it's Adrian?
Veidt? Behind everything? Makes no sense. (CONTINUED)

On the surface it doesn't, but hear me out--Adrian's the only one who could've taken on the Comedian in hand to hand combat. He's the only one with the finances to create an entire company for the sole purpose of setting up Dr. Manhattan. And Adrian was directly involved in arranging that broadcast. He probably supplied this journalist with the whole cancer list.
That doesn't explain the attempt on Veidt's life.
If we say that Adrian set that up himself, he could've had the hitman shoot his assistant first. It was a risk, but--
But why?
I don't know. Let's go ask him.

The endless white blanket that is Antarctica is interrupt by a SPLASH OF COLOR in the distance. As we approach, we that the color is a BIO-DOME--a tropical RAINFOREST insid This is part of KARNAK: Adrian Veidt's Arctic Fortress.

Adrian stands at the entrance of the Bio-Dome, amidst the exotic foliage, where a GROUP of SCIENTISTS and ENGINEERS gathered. They all hold CHAMPAGNE FLUTES--Adrian raises h glass for a toast when the HEAD SCIENTIST interrupts.
Mr. Veidt, may I?
By all means, Eric.
I just would like to say that when I was first offered this position, I was hesitant. A multi-year commitment to work in Antarctica? (MORE) (CONTINUED)

But the opportunity to experiment with Dr. Manhattan's atomic fusion energy was too great for me to pass up, too great for any of us to pass up. And now that our work is finished, and we finally get to go home, I can say that it was all worth it. Mr. Veidt, you are a genius. The world will be a better place because of you.

I certainly hope so. The group applauds. Then they sip their champagne. All ex for Adrian The group goes around congratulating each other, when suddenly the Head Scientist COLLAPSES, choking. The other surround him, trying to help-- --when one by one they each start collapsing themselves-- POISONED by the champagne. Adrian regards them all, writhing on the floor, and leave
In the alley, the Gang Members who killed Hollis Mason st around the Owl-Ship arguing amongst themselves, when Dan appears behind them.
Something I can help you with, boys? They all spin around, frightened at the costume.
(to Gang Leader) I told you we had the wrong guy. The Gang Leader shits his pants as Dan steps closer.
L-listen, I didn't mean to kill that old guy. Things just got outta hand
What old guy?
Hearing SCREAMS outside, Rorschach bursts out of the
(CONTINUED)
--and sees Dan gripping the bloody Gang Leader by the THR CHOKING him as the other Gang Members flee.

You're dead! You and the rest of your gang, you're all DEAD! You know how much fire-power I've got floating out there!? Oh god damn. Hollis. God damn god damn god damn Dan begins to break up. Rorschach quietly pulls him away.
Not now, Daniel.
The Owl-Ship slows to a hover besides an OLDER BUILDING.

Rorschach's Journal. Final entry? Dreiberg is convinced that Veidt is behind everything. Apparently, the Owl- Ship is capable of the trip to Antarctica, but are we? I cannot imagine a more dangerous opponent. Veldt is faster than Dreiberg and myself. He used to joke that he was fast enough to catch a bullet. I believe he could. He could kill us both, alone in' the snow. No one would know. Rorschach descends the ladder, goes to the door of the building. He places his JOURNAL in an ENVELOPE.

I have done my best to make this legible. Whether I am alive or dead upon this reading, know that whatever the nature of this conspiracy--Adrian Veldt is responsible. He drops the envelope into the MAIL SLOT, climbs back up ladder.

I appreciate your recent support and hope the world survives long enough for this to reach you. For my own part, I regret nothing. I have lived my life free of compromise, and step now into the shadow without complaint. Rorschach. October 21st. (CONTINUED)
Rorschach disappears into the dark hatch. The Owl-Ship bl off . disappearing, just as Seymour arrives. Seymour picks up the mail and walks inside.
The Editor walks in as Seymour goes through the mail.
SEYMOUR! Is that Dulmage's editorial cartoon?
It's the mail. Hey cool, someone sent us their journal. (READING)
"Earlier today I came across what appeared to be a suicide. It was later learned to be a homicide. Someone's time was up."
War's coming, Seymour--I don't wanna hear some knob's life story! Chuck it in the crank file! Seymour tosses Rorschach's journal into a PILE OF LETTERS
Laurie's hair blows in the cold wind. She lowers her head Jon serves her some WATER.
Can't you just tell me how this all ends and save us the trouble?
It ends with you in tears.
Tears. You mean I lose? You don't come back to Earth?
I return to Earth at some point. The streets are filled with death.
You mean there's going to be a war? An actual, nuclear war? (CONTINUED)
I can't be sure. I'm still experiencing some static interference preventing any clear vision of what lies ahead.
Static?
Tachyon particles. Tachyons are a rare occurrence. The detonation of nuclear warheads could conceivably be the cause.
Jon, you've got to stop it! Everyone will die!
And the universe will not even notice. See the dual moons. Aren't they breathtaking? Above, TWO MOONS cross overhead. One is HUGE, CRIMSON RED the smaller is a delicate SHELL PINK. Spectacular.

You're right, Jon--what does human life matter next to a, a neutrino. Look, I'm not going to debate you when you clearly don't see anything terribly miraculous about life. I guess quantum physics doesn't allow for miracles.
No, thermodynamic miracles are--
Oh God, Jon. Land this thing. Now.
On the Argyre Planitia? As you wish. The structure descends. Laurie stomps down the stairs.

That's it then. You can send me back to Earth to fry with Dan and my Mom and all the other worthless humans. And look, you were wrong. You said this ended with me in tears and see? Not a damp eye in the house. Maybe you're wrong about everything. (CONTINUED)
Jon is waiting for her at the bottom of the stairs.

Laurie. You complain that I refuse to see life on life's terms. And yet you continuously refuse to see things from my perspective. If only you'd try to see the whole continuum, life's pattern, you'd understand. But you deliberately shut it out as if afraid to see.
I'm not afraid, okay? You want me to see things your way? Go ahead, do that thing you do. She stands there, arms folded, waiting. Then, just like earlier in the lab, Jon touches her head--

Same flashback as before, in Laurie's childhood home. We' in Laurie's POV, as a little girl. There's arguing downstairs. Laurie goes down to investigate. She comes upon the kitchen door, ajar. She can see her PARENTS inside, arguing .
You wanted to hear it, so I'm telling you, okay?. Magic! Dreams! That's what I had before. I was a hero goddammit!

It's not my fault you got old! What do you have to complain about?! I'm putting food on the table for you and your child. Why don't you give your friend Eddie a call? Maybe he can give you a better life!
It was a mistake--one time! Am I never-- And then they notice Laurie looking at them.
Mommy?
Oh. Oh, Laurie (CONTINUED)
Tears run down little Laurie's face. Her parents are
--Laurie breaks away from ion and drops down to her knees tears flowing.
No. No, no, no, no not him
The comedian was your father.
But he--
Attacked your mother. Yes. (searching in his mind) Two years later he came back to her, to make amends. And you were conceived on that day.

Laurie WHIPS a BOTTLE at the palace-- --and the huge glass construction CRUMBLES. Jon protects with a FORCE FIELD as debris collapses around them. Lauri sobs in the echoing SILENCE. Jon's eyes SHUT. He seems to feel . empathy. A TEAR slips down his cheek. Laurie's realization is a revelation for
The comedian is my father. I guess my life is just one big joke.
I don't think your life is a joke.
Well, of course you're going to say that.
But I've changed my mind. There are miracles in your world that are worth preserving.
What? But you were saying-- (CONTINUED)

I tried to explain. Thermodynamic miracles--events with odds against so astronomical, like oxygen turning into gold. I have longed to witness such a thing and yet I neglect that in human coupling, millions upon millions of cells compete to create life over generation after generation: Until finally, your mother loves a man--Edward Blake, the Comedian--a man she has every reason to hate. And out of that contradiction, against unfathomable odds, it was you, only you, that emerged. To distill so specific a form from all of that chaos; Your creation is like . turning air into gold. A miracle.
But if my birth is a miracle you, you could say that about anyone.
Yes, anyone in the world. But the world is so crowded with miracles that they become commonplace and we forget. I forget. They stand there in silence. Connected for the first time years.
Now. Dry your eyes. FROM ABOVE: We see the full CRATER--the ARGYRE PLANITIA. Round, with two, eye-like BOULDERS set side by side, a RI of land curling below . like a smiley-face.
And let's go home.
The owl-Ship sails through a TOWERING CLOUD BANK. The COA approaches as SNOW starts to fall.
Dan stares ahead, stoic. Thinking about Hollis, Laurie an Adrian. He glances at a MONITOR, tracking heat signatures There's a LARGE SIGNAL ahead. (CONTINUED)
I've got a large reading ahead. Anything that's emitting that much heat out here, must be a pretty big facility. Adrian. (BEAT)
We're not going to make it, are we? Rorschach says nothing . when a halting WHINE sputters from the engines. A HUGE CLIFF APPEARS before them.
The engines--
They're icing up, hold on! Dan pulls the stick back. The ship SHUDDERS UPWARD.
The ship, tiny before the massive ice-wall, climbs slowly It's going to be close. The wall is 100 yards away now, t top-most edge barely in view. 50 yards. 20 and then
We just lost the engines--find something to grab on to! The ship BARELY CLEARS THE CLIFF. BOUNCING hard, it SKIPS across the snow like a stone, finally CRASHING INTO A DRI
Dan opens the hatch. Shrieking WIND blows the snow in. Da pulls on a white, FUR-LINED SNOW-OWL costume.
The engines are de-icing. You sure I can't fit you with something warmer?
Fine like this.
Rorschach pulls up his trench-collar against the bitter w Dan pulls two stand-up HOVER-SCOOTERS from an OUTSIDE HAT They exchange a look and ride the scooters off into the s 105.

Adrian, dressed in his Ozymandias costume, sits alone in massive hall, opposite a wall of giant PLASMA-SCREENS whi show various television NEWS CHANNELS showing all the IMA OF WAR IN THE WORLD. Adrian sighs and hits the remote--the screens become ONE IMAGE--ALEXANDER THE GREAT slicing the Gordian Knot. By Adrian's feet is an exotic LYNX. Its unnatural beauty almost hides a feral danger in its eyes. Adrian pets the beast.

See this painting? Alexander the Great. Before his conquest of Phoenicia, he struck North for Gordium, where the world's greatest puzzle waited. A great knot, impossible to untie. For a young man determined to rule the world, it was a challenge he couldn't resist. So he sliced it in two with his sword. Lateral thinking, you see. Suddenly the Lynx stands, GROWLS.
What is it, girl? He hits the remote--the TV screens switch to MULTIPLE VIE OF Dan and Rorschach, heading toward Karnak.
Ah. It's all right, girl. Everything's all right.
Flying on the scooter, Dan wipes frost and fog from his goggles. He then looks up and-- --sees KARNAK, a GARGANTUAN GLASS PYRAMID, rising out of snow, the Bio-Dome attached to it.
Adrian watches Dan and Rorschach reach the door on the monitors. (CONTINUED)

Really, getting even this far is an admirable effort, given their limitations. Of course the ice they're skating on is slippery and thinner than it looks. Let's hope they don't overstep themselves. On the monitors, Dan takes a LASER TORCH to the door.
Let's hope they know when to stop.
Having burnt through the control panel, Dan pushes the hu door open. They enter the grand palace, dwarfed by its Macedonian massiveness.
(BEAT)
I don't understand any of this. Adrian's a pacifist. He's never killed anyone in his life. He's a vegetarian for Christ's sake!
Hitler was a vegetarian. If you're squeamish, leave him to me. We won't get a second chance.
Dan and Rorschach pass the wall of plasma screens into--

--the dining hall, where Adrian eats alone, at a long tab Though they're only a few yards away, Adrian doesn't appe to see them, hidden by some PILLARS. Dan and Rorschach signal to each other, quiet. Adrian eat --and Rorschach RUSHES him from behind-- --Adrian moves at the last second, grabs Rorschach's arm, ELBOWS him in the chest, spins and BACKHAND FISTS him, sending him flying back.
Mind your manners. (CONTINUED)
Dan draws his PEN-LASER.

Adrian, don't make me-- Adrian picks up a GOLDEN SERVING TRAY off the table as Da FIRES. Adrian DEFLECTS the laser with the tray-- --then DISCUS-SLINGS the tray into Dan's NOSE. Blood SPRA Dan drops to his knees. Adrian turns his back on them, ca
Now. What can I do for you?
You know! You killed the Comedian! You set up Rorschach! You created Pyramid Industries, hired all those people, gave them cancer and blamed it on Jon!
Yes.
Dammit Adrian, what are you trying to do?

What we always intended--to improve the world. As Adrian speaks, Rorschach sneaks up behind him, with a FORK. He tries to stab Adrian in the back, but Adrian effortlessly dodges the blow, GRABS Rorschach's mask, TWI it, then KNEES him in the gut. Rorschach drops to the flo Adrian starts walking out of the hall. Dan helps Rorschac and they follow.

I never intended to kill the Comedian-- that was an accident. Part of his duties as a government operative was to keep track of all former masked heroes, make sure there was no rocking of the boat. He must have liked Rorschach because he allowed him to continue to exist. I had thought that the Comedian might be incompetent, but he disproved that hypothesis when he discovered what was really going on. here in Karnak--no easy task. Even my staff was unaware--I made sure to keep each department separate. (MORE) (CONTINUED)

The Comedian was appalled by my plan, but still, he understood the scope of what I was trying to accomplish. Frankly, I never thought he'd actually talk. But by the time he visited poor Moloch, he was cracking badly. So I had to kill him.
As they enter the control hall, Rorschach moves to attack Adrian again when he and Dan hear a growl . the Lynx steps in between, protecting its master.

After Blake, I neutralized Jon--a plan nearly a decade in the works after analyzing confidential psychological profiles which predicted his withdrawal from human existence. By then, Rorschach's mask theory, 'though erroneous, needed to be addressed, so I faked my own assassination--
Why take that risk? What if the hitman shot you first instead of your assistant?
I suppose I'd have to be fast enough to catch the bullet then, wouldn't I? Adrian smiles enigmatically.

After apprehending my own assassin, I shoved a cyanide capsule in his mouth, disposing of him, and soon after that, the journalist Doug Roth, tying up all the loose ends if you will. Then I knew nothing stood in the way of my triumph.
Triumph? Adrian, what are you going to do?

I'm firing a beam of concentrated energy, synthesized from Dr. Manhattan himself, into the hearts of nine key regions around the globe, crossing all traditional politics and ideologies; (MORE) (CONTINUED)
Paris, Tehran, Kashmir, Beijing, Taiwan, Pyongyang, London, Jerusalem, New York-- destroying approximately three million people.
Three million people? You're joking.
He's not. Listen to his voice.
Rorschach, he's making it up!

I understand your disbelief, Dan. When I began the plan ten years ago, my moral safeguards gave me pause at the necessary sacrifice. See, the Comedian was correct. What we were doing with the Watchmen was pointless--the savage nature of humankind would inevitably lead to the end of the world. So in order to save the world, I had to trick it--to frighten the world towards salvation with history's greatest practical joke.
By killing millions of people? And when were you planning on doing this?
When? Dan, my dear friend, I am the smartest man in the world--do you seriously think I'd explain my master stroke if there remained even the slightest chance of you affecting it's outcome? (BEAT)
I did it thirty minutes ago.
A BEAM of BLUE ENERGY SHOOTS INTO THE SKY from Karnak. Th energy infects the CLOUDS, CHARGED with CRASHING, ERRATIC BLUE LIGHTNING SPREADING out across the globe
As the News vendor opens his stand--
The President and his Cabinet look out the windows, up at electric blue clouds

head_text.subj: THIS IS DR. MANHATTAN. FOR YEARS, I HAVE

text: We're with the Pakistani and Indian Soldiers from earlier stopping their gun fight to look up at the sky--
(in Hindi) THIS ENDS TONIGHT.
We're with the Chinese Battleships from earlier--
(in Mandarin)

head_text.subj: FROM THIS MINUTE ON, YOU SHALL CHANGE
YOUR POLICIES AND YOUR WAYS OF VIOLENCE-

text: We're with the Israelis from earlier, watching on screen-
(in Hebrew)

head_text.subj: ANY NATION THAT DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY
STAND DOWN AND DISMANTLE THEIR WEAPONS

text: Realization is dawning on the faces of the New Yorkers.

head_text.subj: FROM THIS MINUTE ON--I WILL BE WATCHING.

text: Suddenly the SOUND of a rising, HOWLING WIND and the LIGHTNING STRIKES begin, CRASHING TO EARTH with savage, blistering force. Their expended blue energy SPREADS like LIQUID FIRE, FLOODING THROUGH THE STREETS. People SCREAM and RUN. As the LIGHT OVERTAKES the unlucky ones, they are instantly BLOWN TO ASH-- (CONTINUED)
(WORLD MONTAGE): --as is the News Vendor; the Pakistani a Indian Soldiers; the Chinese Battleships; the Israeli Mis Control Room; Paris; the Great Wall of China. Destroyed.

The smoke-filled street is silent. Then GLOWING PARTICLES COALESCE, slamming together to form Jon and Laurie, but J teleportation falters, shorting out. They FALL from the a Laurie drops roughly to her knees.
God Jon, what was that? Jon looks around the street. Even he is awe-struck.

Interference. Cataclysmic interference. Laurie looks up and screams. THOUSANDS OF BLACK SILHOUETT are IMPRINTED on the STREET and the WALLS. Everywhere. Th is no rubble--some buildings have simply disintegrated.
Was it a war? It doesn't seem like--
Not a war. I .don't know what it was. Dr. Manhattan looks up into the sky, studying it.
Take me out of here, Jon. Please.
I'm sorry. This must be very upsetting for you. I have traced the source of the Tachyon particles to Antarctica. Shall we?
Anywhere. Anywhere's better than here.
PULL OUT FROM: The televisions--NEWS REPORTS from all ove the world, documenting the tragic destruction caused by D Manhattan. Dan turns away shaken. Rorschach boils. Adrian beams.
God. God, he (CONTINUED)
Impersonated Dr. Manhattan. Murdered millions of people. (re: Lynx) Call off your cat. Call off your cat and face me!
Don't you understand? I've ended the war-- I've ended all wars. Because of their fear of ion, I've forced the world into everlasting peace.
By committing the biggest mass murder in history. You have no right to play God!

I wasn't playing God. Just Dr. Manhattan. Suddenly there's a LOUD BEEPING in the hall. The Lynx gro Adrian switches the monitors to the security cameras which show ion and Laurie materialize in the snow.
Speak of the devil.
Laurie vomits in the snow.
Adrian, of course. Who else would have the resources
Wait, this is Adrian's compound? Are you saying he's responsible for this-- Jon walks toward the building, entranced. Distracted.
Yes. Yes, he killed Blake and millions of others. Excuse me, Daniel, I'm talking to Laurie ninety seconds ago
What, Daniel? Millions of others? Jon don't start that crap now, not here! (CONTINUED)
I'm sorry. It's these tachyons. They're, muddling things up. I'd better follow him
In a burst, he's gone.
Jon materializes in the hall. Adrian sprints like lighten out of the room, followed by the Lynx.
No, don't let him escape!
Jon, stop him, he killed millions of people, who knows what else he'll do. Jon walks calmly after Adrian.
Jon, are you okay? You seem drugged.
Yes. Yes, he killed Blake and millions of others. Excuse me, Daniel, I'm talking to Laurie ninety seconds ago
What? Where's Laurie?
I'm sorry. It's these tachyons. They're, muddling things up. I'd better follow him
Jon follows Adrian into the next room.
Jon enters the MAZE of advanced technology.

Adrian, don't be foolish. Even if I can't predict where I'm going to find you, I can turn the walls to glass. The tachyons were clever but it's time to give up Jon spots the Lynx in a METAL CORRIDOR. (CONTINUED)
Very well. If I must, let us follow this through to the bitter end. ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE WALLS is Adrian, waiting by a CONTROL PANEL. He takes one last look at his Lynx.
Forgive me, girl. Jon enters the corridor with the Lynx; Adrian flicks a SWITCH. The Lynx' FUR STANDS ON END as ENERGY CRACKLES BETWEEN THE METAL WALLS. The Lynx HOWLS.
Adrian? Adrian, don't-- LIGHT BLASTS through Jon and the Lynx--both are OBLITERAT Adrian peers around the corner, winded by his success.
You know, I really wasn't sure that would work.
Adrian turns. Laurie aims the prison guard's pistol at hi
You're such an asshole. Adrian cries out, LEAPS at her as she FIRES-- --and hits Adrian. He COLLAPSES. Dan and Rorschach find t as Laurie approaches Adrian's body
Laurie, shoot him again! Adrian's hand falls from his chest to the floor, blood trickling, as his PALM OPENS-- --holding a BULLET inside.
Oh shit. Adrian opens his eyes and KICKS her in the stomach, sendi her flying back. (CONTINUED)
LAURIE! If you've hurt her, I'll--
Oh Dan. Grow up. Adrian exits as Dan helps the winded Laurie to her feet. Together, Rorschach, Dan and Laurie follow him back to:
Adrian approaches his wall of TV screens when--

head_text.subj: I AM DISAPPOINTED IN YOU ADRIAN. VERY

text: Jon, now 100 FEET TALL, SMASHES THROUGH THE WALL. Adrian crawls desperately away, grasping for his remote on the floor. As Jon approaches him, Jon SHRINKS to six feet.

Restructuring myself was the first trick I learned! It didn't kill me before, did you seriously think it would kill me now? You are nothing but a man. And the world's smartest man means no more to me than its smartest termite! Out of tricks, out of traps, Adrian lifts the remote.
What is that, Adrian? Some new, ultimate weapon?

Yes. Yes, you could say that. Adrian goes back to his wall of screens, watching the new reports. We hear SOUND BITES and IMAGES: "India and Pakis immediately call for truce," "China stands down," "US withdraws forces," "Israel agrees on cease fire." TEARS stand in Adrian's eyes. He raises his fists in triu
I did it. I DID IT! I've saved Earth from Hell. Next, I will elevate her to the vaulting stature of Heaven.
Next? You can't get away with this! (CONTINUED)
No? Will you expose me, undoing the peace so many have just died for? Morally, you're in checkmate, just like the Comedian was. Jon examines the many screens, taking it all in.
I'm afraid he's correct. Exposing Adrian would only doom the world to nuclear destruction again.
He's right. All we did was fail to stop him from saving Earth.
We we can't say anything about this
You're joking, of course. Rorschach walks toward the exit.
Rorschach, wait a second! Let's talk this out!
Never. Not even in the face of Armageddon. Never compromise. Adrian and Jon's eyes meet--an unspoken communication. Se this, Dan runs after Rorschach.
Rorschach! Across the hall, ion materializes between Rorschach and t exit.
Where are you going, Rorschach?
Back to the Owl-Ship. Back to America. People must be told. Evil must be punished. (CONTINUED)
Rorschach, you know I can't let you do that. Rorschach pauses. Dan is halfway there . Rorschach removes his mask, tears stand in his eyes.
Suddenly you've rediscovered humanity? If you had cared from the start, none of this would be necessary. None of this would have happened. So what are you waiting for? Do it.

Jon WAVES HIS HAND and BLOWS RORSCHACH APART. Dan collaps to his knees, sobbing. Jon contemplates the BURN-MARK whe Rorschach stood only seconds ago, then disappears-- --reappearing across the hall where Laurie is. She is als tears, watching all the horrible footage on the TV screen
Laurie. I'm leaving this galaxy. For one a little less complicated.
Leaving? I, I thought you regained an interest in human life.
I have. I think maybe I'll create some. Goodbye, Laurie. He kisses her on the cheek--
Jon, I'd hoped to talk to you. I've made myself feel every death, see every innocent face I've murdered to save humanity--you understand, don't you?
Without condoning or condemning, I
And with that, he disappears. Forever. (CONTINUED)
Across the hall, Dan recovers from mourning Rorschach. He stands, gritting his teeth. Walks toward Adrian.
What's on your mind, Dan?
Your death.
Really. You want to kill me?
Yeah. You might have created peace, but not at the expense of justice. You need to pay for what you've done.
That doesn't sound like you, Dan. That sounds more like Rorschach.
Exactly. Adrian readies himself. Laurie breaks away from the TV screens.
Only you're not Rorschach, are you now? How do you expect to succeed where he failed?

Tell you the truth, Adrian. I don't. Dan FLIES at Adrian, fighting like a madman for his life. His fighting style has changed. Dan's newfound brutality informed by everything he's learned from Rorschach. About justice. About life. But Adrian is the best. He takes Dan's attacks apart with ease, delivering blows which would kill a man not quite s focused on his goal. In the end, he CATCHES Dan's final strike and TWISTS. Dan's arm SNAPS easily.
Dan! Laurie charges Adrian. With one hand, Adrian blocks her attack, grabs her by the hair and SLAMS her to floor, knocking her out. (CONTINUED)
Dan falls to his knees, bloody and beaten. Out of tricks, of time, he searches his belt for something, anything, an finds one last OWL-WING. The WINGS SNAP OUT. Desperate, h
Who merely SNATCHES the owl-Wing out of the air. He laugh Prepares to finish Dan off.
I have to say, I've always thought your choice of an owl was quite juvenile.
Really? I've always liked owls Adrian sees that Dan has pulled one last item from his be Adrian STEPS on Dan's WRIST, bones crunching. Dan's HAND falls OPEN, revealing the OWL-SHIP REMOTE.

because you can never hear them coming. BEHIND ADRIAN: FLOODLIGHTS BLAZE, targeting Adrian as the SHIP CRASHES THROUGH THE WINDOW and into Adrian and Dan. Silence, but for the tinkling of GLASS falling to the flo Dan tries to stand, but he falls, his left leg shattered. Most of Adrian has been CRUSHED under the ship. He coughs fine blood spray. Adrian looks over to Dan, dying.
I . don't regret my actions. I know in my heart . I did the right thing.
So do I. Adrian lays back, calm, accepting and dies.
Dan sits painfully in the passenger seat, as Laurie tries pilot the ship out of Adrian's bedroom.
That's it. Careful. Now, pull the stick to the left The ship RISES and TURNS awkwardly in the hall, smashing more glass. (CONTINUED)
Now, the thrusters . There. She HITS THE THRUSTERS. The ship FLIES from the control r It's afterburners IGNITING the room, and Adrian's body.
The Owl-Ship RISES into the sky, the Pyramid of Karnak BLAZING from it's tip like a Roman candle. Dan watches ou the window, until his eyes slip shut

Time has passed. The disintegrated buildings are being rebuilt. The shock of the attack is wearing off, and thou the streets may not be as crowded as they once were, a se of normalcy is returning. Sally Jupiter walks the sidewalk, looking for an address.
Sally mixes herself a tall drink at the bar. Sally calls
You sure you don't want a drink?
I'm okay. Thanks. We finally see Laurie now--her hair dyed, appearance chan
Mom--I just want to get this out of the way . . I know Eddie Blake, the Comedian--I know he was my father. Sally freezes.
I remember. Sally downs her drink, immediately starts making another.
It, it was years later, he stopped by out of the blue, and, and apologized. I don't know, I just couldn't stay mad. It just happened-- Laurie kisses her mother's teary cheek. (CONTINUED)
Mom. People's lives take them strange places. You never did anything wrong by me. Sally jumps as a CLICK/WHIR SOUND comes from a BOOKCASE.
What the hell is that?

Oh that's Dan. Home from "work." The bookcase SLIDES ASIDE and a blond DAN enters from the secret ELEVATOR. He is trim and confident, cheeks flushed with color. Buttoning up his shirt, he spots Sally.
Oh hi.
Hello, Dan. Excuse me, I should clean up. Sally wipes her runny make-up, goes to the bathroom. Dan and Laurie embrace, kiss.
Any bad guys last night?
There are always bad guys. Even in today's world. Slow, Laurie turns to the window. Looks out at the New Yo skyline being rebuilt.
Dan.
Hmm?
Will it be alright? The world, I mean. He puts his arm around her shoulder.
As long as no-one ever finds out that Adrian was behind it all, the public will think ion is still up there, watching. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
The threat remains, and everything should be fine.
Yeah. Just fine
CLOSE ON: A YELLOW HAPPY FACE--suddenly SPLOTCHED with RE printed on A T-SHIRT now stained with ketchup. WE PULL BACK: And find Seymour wears the shirt, eating a burger when the Editor bursts in.
SEYMOUR! What the hell do you got for me?

We got nothing to write about. Everyone in the country, every country in the world is holding hands now, singing songs about peace and love--it's like we're living in a goddamn global hippie commune !
Um, I guess I can look for stuff in the crank file.
Crank file? Whatever! Take some initiative! Run whatever you like-- Seymour turns to the PILE of submissions known as the cra file, where RORSCHACH'S JOURNAL sits on top. Seymour reac
--I leave it entirely in your hands. --and picks up Rorschach's Journal . Just as he's about to open it, we CUT TO BLACK.
